fees.description: Min disconnection fee incl. GST. Fees can vary for meter type, location or other factors. All fees here www.globirdenergy.com.au/fees
Min connection fee incl GST. Fees can vary for meter type, location or other factors. All fees here www.globirdenergy.com.au/fees

electricityContract.terms: This offer is for QLD residential customers with an applicable network tariff and an electricity basic meter. Please visit www.globirdenergy.com.au for full terms and conditions or call us on 133456. Note, step 1 is calculated by multiplying the daily allowance by the number of days in the billing period. For example, a daily allowance of 25kWh/day and a 30-day billing period has a step 1 of 750kWh, or a 31-day 775kWh.

discounts.description: You will receive 1% discount off Usage & Supply charges when you pay your bill on-time by direct debit
You will receive 2% discount off Usage & Supply charges when you pay your bill on-time

electricityContract.variation: We may update your solar feed-in, or your rates from time to time. We'll always notify you in writing prior to any change.

singleRate.description: Step 1 of 456.25kWh per month assumes 365 days per year. Actual calculation based on an average of 15.00kWh per day.

greenPowerCharges.description: Annual total includes 100% green power included in the offer rates

solarFeedInTariff.description: GloBird Retailer Feed-in-Tariff (incl. GST if any)

electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply, please see: https://www.globirdenergy.com.au/legal/fees/
